insert.name: insert

edit.name: edit

get.name: get

getFull.name: getFull
getFull.summary: Gets an event with the recurring details.

getRecurrences.name: getRecurrences
getRecurrences.summary: Returns an array of all event's recurrences in a period

makeRecurrencesFields.name: makeRecurrencesFields
makeRecurrencesFields.summary: Makes the fields structure on the given event recurrences

getFirstRecurrence.name: getFirstRecurrence
getFirstRecurrence.summary: Returns the date of the first recurrence of a recurring event.

deleteRecurrences.name: deleteRecurrences
deleteRecurrences.summary: Deletes the recurrences of the given event

getWhenObject.name: getWhenObject
getWhenObject.summary: Makes a When object by an event.

filterRecurrencesByExceptions.name: filterRecurrencesByExceptions
filterRecurrencesByExceptions.summary: Filters the event's recurrences by exceptions.

setUntil.name: setUntil

unsetUntil.name: unsetUntil
unsetUntil.summary: Sets the event's until property to null

addException.name: addException

copyExceptions.name: copyExceptions
copyExceptions.summary: Copies the event's exceptions to an other one.

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

log.name: log

parent.name: log

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

exists.name: exists

getFields.name: getFields
getFields.summary: Returns the fields of the main table.

update.name: update
update.summary: Updates a single row in the table through its id.

select.name: select
select.summary: Retrieves a row from the table through its id.

selectAll.name: selectAll
selectAll.summary: Returns an array of rows from the table for the given conditions.
